entry.content:
What Cubs DoÂ 
Â 
Click below to find out.Â 

Who are Cubs? What do Cubs get up to? What does a pack look like?

Cubs are young people aged 8 to 10Â½ who:

  • Master new skills and try new things
  • Have fun and go on adventures
  • Make friends
  • Are curious about the world around them
  • Help others and make a difference, in their own communities and beyond

Every week, they gather in groups calledÂ Cub PacksÂ to take part in lots of interesting and challenging activities â€“ achieving anything they set their minds to, and having lots of fun along the way.

entry.title: Cubs - What do Cubs get up to?
entry.summary: What Cubs Do Click below to find out. Who are Cubs? What do Cubs get up to? What does a pack look like? Going on adventures Race down a river. Tell stories by torchlight. Fall asleep beneath the stars. Alongside your Pack, youâ€™ll spend plenty…
entry.content:
What Cubs DoÂ 
Â 
Click below to find out.Â 

Who are Cubs? What do Cubs get up to? What does a pack look like?

Going on adventures

Race down a river. Tell stories by torchlight. Fall asleep beneath the stars. Alongside your Pack, youâ€™ll spend plenty of time in the great outdoors. Together, you might build a den in your local park, or create an edible raft out of sweets, or go on a moonlit hike through your hometown.

Learning new skills

Cubs learn by doing, and so will you. Some of the skills you develop will be practical, like knowing how to cook a delicious meal or give someone first aid.

Helping others

Cubs work as a team to help other people. Together, youâ€™ll learn about global issues and what we can all do to help solve them.

entry.title: Contact Us
entry.summary: UsefulÂ Email Addresses If you would like to get in touch, please use one of the email addresses below and one of our friendly scout leaders will be in touch with you as soon as they can. entry.title: Beavers
entry.summary: Our Cubs and Scouts are now thriving and we're really hoping to be able to start Beavers soon! We are looking for new adult volunteers to be able to do this! Are you looking for a fun and exciting challenge? Or do you know someone…
entry.content:
Our Cubs and Scouts are now thriving and we're really hoping to be able to start Beavers soon!
Â 
We are looking for new adult volunteers to be able to do this! Are you looking for a fun and exciting challenge? Or do you know someone who could help?
Â 
Volunteer as much or as little as you're able, our Scouting team are all equally as important. We need your support to open.
Â 
Contact Hannah.Jackson@scouts.org.uk
Â 
Â 
Interested in joining your young person to our Waiting List, for any section? Send us a message!

entry.title: 1st and 7th (Jubilee) Frome Scouts

entry.content:
Welcome to 1st and 7th Frome Scouts group

About 1st & 7th Frome 'Jubilee' Scout Group

Beavers (6-8yrs)ğŸ¦«

Cubs (8-10Â½yrs)ğŸº
Cub Scout Packs are split into small groups called Sixes. Cubs take part in a wide range of activities designed to be interesting and challenging.
Our Cubs have just restarted on Thursdays 6pm -7.30pm.

Scouts (10Â½â€“14yrs)
Our Scout Troop consists of small units of six to eight Scouts called a Patrol, led by a Patrol Leader. Outdoor activities feature prominently, with the highlight being camping. Throughout the year, Scouts learn various skills, such as map reading, camp cooking and first aid in preparation for camp.
The Scout Section meets Monday's 7.30pm till 9pm.

Interested? Get in touch!
